sen.j: 切り通し（きりとおし）は京都市東山区内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Kiritoshi Street is one of narrow streets running north to south in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Kiritoshi Street is a narrow street running north to south in Higashima Ward, Kyoto City.
Kiritoshi Street is a narrow street running north to south in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は新橋通から南は四条通までの僅か約180mの通り。
sen.e: Kiritoshi Street is only approximately 180m long, meeting Shinbashi-dori Street at the north end and Shijo-dori Street at the south end.
Kiritoshi Street is only about 180 meters long, ending at Shinbashi-dori Street to the north and Shijo-dori Street to the south.
sen.cmt: "only" followed by "approximately" sounds awkward; "at the north end" and "at the south end" are too wordy
sen.e: Kiritoshi Street is only about 180 meters long, ending at Shinbashi-dori Street to the north and Shijo-dori Street to the south.

sen.j: 距離は短いが、東の花見小路通、西の大和大路通と共に、祇園の中心となる通り。
sen.e: Despite its short length, Kiritoshi Street along with two paralleling roads, Hanamikoji-dori Street in the east and Yamatooji-dori Street in the west, are the main streets of "Gion".
Despite its length, Kiritoshi Street is considered a main street in Gion, running parallel to Hanamikoji-dori Street to the east and Yamatoji-dori Street to the west.
sen.cmt: "shortness" meaning established in prior sentence; "paralleling" awkward here; Yamatooji-dori Street→Yamatoji-dori Street
sen.e: Despite its length, Kiritoshi Street is considered a main street in Gion, running parallel to Hanamikoji-dori Street to the east and Yamato-oji-dori Street to the west.

sen.j: 新橋通、白川南通から末吉町通の間は狭い路地のような通りであるが、新橋通などと同様、石畳が敷かれおり、風情ある景観を見ることが出来る。
sen.e: The sections divided by Shinbashi-dori Street, Shirakawa minami-dori Street and Sueyoshimachi-dori Street running east to west are narrow streets like alleys, but they are tasteful due to the stone pavement similar to Shinbashi-dori Street and others.

The sections between Shinbashi-dori Street, Shirakawaminami-dori Street and Sueyoshicho-dori Street seem to be narrow alleyways, but similar to streets like Shinbashi-dori they are elegantly paved with stones.
sen.cmt: 新橋町 is read as Shinbashicho, according to google maps and kanjidict;
sen.e: The sections between Shinbashi-dori Street, Shirakawaminami-dori Street and Sueyoshicho-dori Street are like narrow alleyways, but similar to streets like Shinbashi-dori Street, they are elegantly paved with stones.
sen.cmt: 文脈より、seem to be→are likeに修正しました。Shinbashi-dori→Shinbashi-dori StreetStreetの後にカンマを挿入しました。

tit.e: The main facilities along the street
The main facilities along the street
The main facilities along the street

sen.cmt: 「たつみばし」と読みますので、hashi→bashi
